title: Mountain Goat Consultants
mainText: {kw:Effect} — Whenever you buy a blueprint, you may pay {r:shinies=4} and add one counter to this event. If you do, immediately place the bought blueprint in your town and add one construction progress to it.{n}{n}{kw:Resolve}{r:vp=1} — trash this card.
flavourText: Isn't it surprising that the mountain goats of Rotheim know so much about building? They don't even mine! - Kartok, the Elder Stonemason.
